about_the_game:
A dynamic and colorful platform game featuring penguins that transports players to a magical world where they compete against each other. The game combines classic platform gameplay with a variety of modes, making each session unique and full of surprises.

Tile Coloring Mode

The goal is to color as many tiles on the board as possible by jumping on them and leaving your color behind. Players can interfere with each other by jumping on already colored tiles and changing their color to their own. This requires not only agility but also strategy to anticipate the moves of rivals and dominate the board. When time runs out, the player who has colored the most tiles wins.

Saboteur Mode

In "Saboteur Mode," one player is designated as the secret saboteur, whose task is to thwart the plans of the other penguins. The saboteur can set traps to slow down or immobilize other players. The rest of the penguins must work together to complete tasks while trying to discover who the saboteur is before it’s too late.

name: PingWin

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2100
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750 Ti
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 256 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6600K
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 6GB
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 256 MB available space

short_description: PingWin is a dynamic platform game where you take on the role of agile penguins competing in various modes, such as tile coloring and saboteur. The game offers a colorful world and plenty of adventures alongside other players!
